column5: And it's cold and miserable outside. A young man's fancy turns to warm climes and open water fishing. Just found this site and it has some of my favorite shows in it. Have fun peeps!!!!! Waypoint TV
I'd forgotten about that site, tks for the reminder Dave. My bandwidth sucks, specially at night so I just let it load and then watch later. Cheers
Lovely site and its content, thank you Dave
Thanks Dave!Â  I don't watch TV (our rabbit ears don't work any more), so this is GREAT! Doug

funny how in december/early january the boys and I were wondering if we would ever even get out on the snowmobiles to fish yet her we are with a foot of the best ice ive ever seen and a fresh massive dumping of snow. It doesnt take much does it!
You can keep that snow!Â  Some of our spots are going to be a "BEACH" to access on foot wading through that stuff....
Ya, got a foot here last night and had to go to Vaughan this morning for back injections,Â  boy a ride I wouldn't want to do every day of the week.
